name: 層序地層學
goals: This course is designed to study the latest theories of eustatic sea-level changes and sequence stratigraphy
syllabus:
_**重要資訊**_: We will use "Google Meet" for the first 3 weeks.

The links is: meet.google.com/knz-nuok-woy

This course is designed to study the latest theories of eustatic sea-level changes, sequence stratigraphy and their application to mineral economics.

二、教材內容：

1\. Eustatic sea-level changes

2\. Depositional systems and systems tracts

3\. Sequence stratigraphy

4\. Sequence stratigraphic models

5\. Recognizing sequence from outcrops, well-logs and seismic profiles

6\. Sedimentary basin fills

7\. Economic applications

8\. Theory vs. reality in sequence stratigraphy

9\. Importance of the tectonic setting

10\. Standardization of sequence stratigraphy

11\. Use and abuse of sequence stratigraphy
prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
